swiggy - Principal Product Manager - Pricing

Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

It August 01, 2022

If you are excited about transforming the way millions order food in India, we would like to have you join our team as a Senior/Principal Product Manager in Swiggy Revenue and Growth team.

We are looking for a senior person to join our Pricing team to accelerate our efforts in building the core technology platform powering one of the biggest growth and profitability lever viz.pricing and create highly intuitive, innovative and delightful customer experiences. In this role, you will work with various internal product teams, UX researchers/designers, data scientists, analytics, marketing and business to build a strategy and roadmap for Swiggy's Pricing charter helping our customers avail services at the most affordable prices helping make Swiggy the platform of choice for anything “convenience”.

You will:

  • Lead and nurture a team of junior PMs to product manage the Pricing charter for Swiggy's ecosystem of apps (consumer, delivery, restaurant, store-partner, etc) to drive business outcomes and delight customers with innovative offerings. Train them to write high quality documents (like One-pagers, Mock-ups, PR/FAQ, ACB-DCB, PRDs etc.)
  • Build & own long term vision, product roadmaps, competitive analysis, market & domain research, GTM to deliver significant business impact and customer delight
  • Work with a team of Data Scientists, Engineering & Analytics to help build the next-gen pricing tech platform to delight our users while driving tangible business outcomes
  • Collaborate with other product teams across the org to ideate and create high quality documents on common objectives’ ideas/products

What do we look for :

  • Minimum 5 years of work experience for SPM and 8 years for PPM. Strong preference (though not mandatory) for folks with:
    • Experience in consumer internet industry (especially product exp.). Experience in Pricing would be a strong Plus.
    • Other start-ups or top-tier consulting (Bain, McKinsey, BCG, Kearney etc.)
  • Go-getter attitude and willingness to be hands-on with a strong ability to communicate and work collaboratively with others
  • Proven track record of building and shipping high-quality data products in B2C products in large internet company impacting millions of users
  • You are consumer obsessed, but you can walk a tightrope balancing consumer delight with potentially orthogonal org goals
  • Well versed with running experiments & is considered an expert in analysing data, showcasing a deep understanding of the 360 degree interaction effects and potential long term impacts, has the ability to cull out the unknowns and hedge against them.
  • Ability to lead a high performing team of data science, analytics, engineering, technology and business folks
  • You have demonstrated experience in working across multiple products, various stakeholders and exerted a high degree of influence across several teams/functions leading to successful outcomes. You thrive in managing a charter with big impact & multiple intersections in a large org
  • Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills. Highly customer-obsessed thinking with a deep understanding of customer needs and aspirations
  • Ability to work under pressure and deliver tangible business impact in time-critical situations
Apply
